title: hi i need help and tips

replies.body:
Hey there angry_pandy, cool name!
Here's a thread on information for the Avicus Network, the whole Network, and nothing but the Network, love that saying. :P http://avicus.net/forums/c3723efec
Here's a list off all the threads you need: http://avicus.net/forums/51143a554
And the rules: http://avicus.net/rules

If you need anything specific, just ask and I'm sure we can help you man. :):)

replies.body:
Welcome to the server!
To add on to what Blizzem and Snow just said, we also have a TeamSpeak 3 server. 
The IP is "ts.avicus.net". Hope to see you on there!

Hope you enjoy your stay here!

replies.body: Hey there, Welcome to the Avicus Network. Feel free to contact me if you ever have any questions, I will be more than happy to answer! If you want, you can check out the Avicus TeamSpeak 3 server as MLGPorky stated above, in the TS server you can talk to many  Avicus players. ;)
